label: 白檀
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: An aromatic wood native to India and Southeast Asia, it is used for craft objects and sculpture. A good example among the Shōsō-in Treasures is the box with uchibari Iid and Buddha seated on a lotus (South Section 158). [正倉院、嚫]
